Changes to Settings are not saved when user does not click on Save button

  1. Go to Settings âžœ Sidebar
  2. Â Click on "edit" for Channel Switcher (mine was set to "on")
  3. Change the setting to "off" (or on if yours was off)
  4. Don't save
  5. Press SHIFT+TAB to set focus on "edit" for Channel grouping and sorting
  6. Hit enter
inline.expectedResult: • Make sure the change you made to the channel switcher did not save
